document.full_text: india could bring in legislation to jail anyone who insults mahatma gandhi while state governments are moving to ban a biography that reviewers said showed the "father of the nation" was bisexual.
document.title: india furious over biography of "bisexual" gandhi
lines_and_colors: india could bring in legislation to jail anyone who insults mahatma gandhi while state governments are moving to ban a biography that reviewers said showed the "father of the nation" was bisexual.
